contentrichtext.text: '''Diary of a Madman''' may refer to: * [[Diary of a Madman (film)|''Diary of a Madman'' (film)]], starring Vincent Price * [[Diary of a Madman (album)|''Diary of a Madman'' (album)]], by Ozzy Osbourne ** [[Diary of a Madman (song)|"Diary of a Madman" (song)]], the album's title track * [[Diary of a Madman (short story)|"Diary of a Madman" (short story)]], short story by Nikolai Gogol * "[[A Madman's Diary]]", a short story by Lu Xun * [[Diary of a Madman (Gravediggaz song)|"Diary of a Madman" (Gravediggaz song)]] * ''Diary of a Mad Old Man'', novel by [[Jun'ichirÅ Tanizaki]] {{disambig}}
